name: Perfectna, Inc.
overview:
Perfectna is a global foreign exchange trading company, operated by Perfectna, Inc. We are the standard for ethical business in the ForEx industry, recruiting top international foreign exchange trading professionals and connecting them with everyday investors through the Perfectna network.

We have combined innovative technologies with proven solutions to offer a transparent, and unmatched investment environment. ForEx traders have the opportunity to optimize their performance by using our powerful analytical tools, and are then able to market that performance through our trader-investor network.

Investors are provided performance information in an easy-to-understand format, empowering everyday investors to invest logically, removing as much emotion from the investment decision making process as possible.

We are currently in a private testing phase. If you would like more information, please use the address in the contact page.
